description: This file declares functions for creating and managing device models, including devices, endpoints, resources, and metadata within a device management SDK. It serves as a header with function prototypes and includes relevant device-related headers.

methods.name: createDevice
methods.description: Creates a new device instance with specified parameters such as UUID, class, version, driver name, and descriptor.

methods.name: createDeviceMetadata
methods.description: Creates device metadata associated with a device given a metadata ID and value.

methods.name: createEndpoint
methods.description: Creates a device endpoint with specified ID, profile, and enabled status.

methods.name: createDeviceResource
methods.description: Creates a device resource with specified resource ID, value, type, mode, and caching policy.

methods.name: createDeviceResourceIfAvailable
methods.description: Creates a device resource if available, initializing it with provided initial resource values.

methods.name: createEndpointResource
methods.description: Creates a resource for a specific endpoint with given parameters.

methods.name: createEndpointResourceIfAvailable
methods.description: Creates an endpoint resource if available, initializing with initial resource values.

methods.name: createEndpointMetadata
methods.description: Creates metadata for a specific endpoint.
